description: Display stats for selected devices on the network

targets.query: SELECT value FROM "network.up.boolean" WHERE device =~ /^$device$/ AND router =~ /^$router$/ AND $timeFilter
SELECT value FROM "ping.latency.milliseconds" WHERE device =~ /^$device$/ AND router =~ /^$router$/ AND $timeFilter
SELECT derivative(value) FROM "network.receive.bytes" WHERE router =~ /^$router$/ AND device =~ /^$device$/ AND $timeFilter
SELECT derivative(value) FROM "network.transmit.bytes" WHERE router =~ /^$router$/ AND device =~ /^$device$/ AND $timeFilter
SELECT value FROM "hour.receive.bytes" WHERE device =~ /^$device$/ AND router =~ /^$router$/ AND $timeFilter
SELECT value FROM "hour.transmit.bytes" WHERE device =~ /^$device$/ AND router =~ /^$router$/ AND $timeFilter
SELECT value FROM "day.receive.bytes" WHERE device =~ /^$device$/ AND router =~ /^$router$/ AND $timeFilter
SELECT value FROM "day.transmit.bytes" WHERE device =~ /^$device$/ AND router =~ /^$router$/ AND $timeFilter
SELECT value FROM "week.receive.bytes" WHERE device =~ /^$device$/ AND router =~ /^$router$/ AND $timeFilter
SELECT value FROM "week.transmit.bytes" WHERE device =~ /^$device$/ AND router =~ /^$router$/ AND $timeFilter
SELECT value FROM "month.receive.bytes" WHERE device =~ /^$device$/ AND router =~ /^$router$/ AND $timeFilter
SELECT value FROM "month.transmit.bytes" WHERE device =~ /^$device$/ AND router =~ /^$router$/ AND $timeFilter

SELECT mean("value") FROM (
  SELECT non_negative_derivative(value, 1s) AS "value"
  FROM "network.receive.bytes" 
  WHERE router =~ /^$router$/ AND device =~ /^$device$/ AND $timeFilter
)
GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("value") FROM (
  SELECT non_negative_derivative(value, 1s) AS "value"
  FROM "network.transmit.bytes" 
  WHERE router =~ /^$router$/ AND device =~ /^$device$/ AND $timeFilter
)
GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean(value) FROM "ping.latency.milliseconds" WHERE router =~ /^$router$/ AND device =~ /^$device$/ AND $timeFilter group by time($interval)
SELECT value FROM "network.up.boolean" WHERE router =~ /^$router$/ AND device =~ /^$device$/ AND $timeFilter

SELECT mean(value) 
FROM "hour.receive.bytes" 
WHERE device =~ /^$device$/ AND router =~ /^$router$/ 
AND $timeFilter
GROUP BY time($interval)

SELECT mean(value)
FROM "hour.transmit.bytes" 
WHERE device =~ /^$device$/ AND router =~ /^$router$/ 
AND $timeFilter
GROUP BY time($interval)

SELECT mean(value) 
FROM "day.receive.bytes" 
WHERE device =~ /^$device$/ AND router =~ /^$router$/ 
AND $timeFilter
GROUP BY time(2h)

SELECT mean(value)
FROM "day.transmit.bytes" 
WHERE device =~ /^$device$/ 
AND router =~ /^$router$/ 
AND $timeFilter
GROUP BY time(2h)

SELECT mean(value) 
FROM "week.receive.bytes" 
WHERE device =~ /^$device$/ 
AND router =~ /^$router$/ 
AND $timeFilter
GROUP BY time(12h)

SELECT mean(value)
FROM "week.transmit.bytes" 
WHERE device =~ /^$device$/ 
AND router =~ /^$router$/ 
AND $timeFilter
GROUP BY time(12h)

SELECT mean(value) 
FROM "month.receive.bytes" 
WHERE device =~ /^$device$/ 
AND router =~ /^$router$/ 
AND $timeFilter
GROUP BY time(2d)

SELECT mean(value) 
FROM "month.transmit.bytes" 
WHERE device =~ /^$device$/ 
AND router =~ /^$router$/ 
AND $timeFilter
GROUP BY time(2d)

list.definition: show tag values with key = router
list.label: Router
list.name: router
list.query: show tag values with key = router

list.definition: show tag values with key = device
list.label: Device
list.name: device

title: Fresh Tomato Devices
